spec_data.Name: perl-libxml-perl
spec_data.Description:
libxml-perl is a collection of smaller Perl modules, scripts, and
documents for working with XML in Perl.  libxml-perl software works in
combination with XML::Parser, PerlSAX, XML::DOM, XML::Grove and
others.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:51:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A collection of Perl modules for working with XML
